dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Bloodfiends are not only vile, they're also very persistent. So~ we should make sure we have everything ready to take them on, right?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Hm? Is it sunrise already? Seems like the hunt is coming to a close.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg:
Yaaawn... I think I'll try to sleep a little.
All the Bloodfiends have crawled into their holes, hiding. I don't need to worry much about ambushes at this hour.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Watch yourself at night. When people aren't looking... That's when Bloodfiends crawl out of their dens in search of our blood.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
Not all Bloodfiend Hunters know each other well.
But did you know that we can immediately tell whenever we're out on a job? There's that... unique flavor of leaden wrath and hatred that is found only in Bloodfiend Hunters.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
I decided to send the Bloodfiend we captured last time to my home.
The elders back home will love it! I'm sure they'll have many things to ask that Bloodfiend, given the long lifespans of its kind.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
Bloodfiends are like wild animals. Sometimes they'll approach you in a friendly manner, sometimes they'll even do something kind. But...
... assume they're full when they're like that. A hungry Bloodfiend will never be that kind toward humans.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
Bloodfiends snatch people away from their own families and contort their brains to turn them into one of their own.
Will your real family no longer be your own after you get turned? What even is a real family, I wonder?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
Some people consider Bloodfiends humans. Otherwise, why won't the Head go after them, right?
Well, that's their criteria. In our eyes, Bloodfiends aren't humans. They are just vermin we have to exterminate.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Would you like a cup of water?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Ha ha... How does it feel, getting hunted down by your prey?

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Are Bloodfiends... making a fuss again?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Don't bother coming along if you don't have what it takes. You'll only step on my foot~

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I should wipe that blood off my weapon.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Let's hunt.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Does it hurt?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Agh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Hahaha!

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: I'll take... one more of you with me...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: This'll be helpful for the hunt!

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Oops... my bad.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: A few of them gave us the slip, but we won in the end. They must be cowering in fear by now.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I think this area's been cleansed of Bloodfiends. Then... shall we head to our next hunting ground?

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Ha ha... we lost, huh? For all that big talk I did... it's a bit embarrassing. But next time, I'll...
